T02D3434:91a-0: @91a / na ma a'a rya aa ba lo ki
T02D3434:91a-1: te shva r'a ya ba dha satv'a ya ma h'a
T02D3434:91a-2: satv'a ya / ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D3434:91a-4: aom dha ra ni dha re dha ra dha re bha dre su bha dre sv'a h'a /
T02D3434:91a-5: zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus sam yang na nyi
T02D3434:91a-6: ma gzas bzung ba'i tshe ba'i rnam lngas khrus byas
T02D3434:91a-7: te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sran ma sha khar
T02D3434:91a-8: bcug nas ji srid ma grol gyi bar de srid
T02D3434:91a-10: 'jig rten mgon po'i bris sku mdun du byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu spar te /
T02D3434:91a-11: tsandan dang sa la ma lhung ba'i ba'i lci bas
T02D3434:91a-12: mandal byas nas spyod lam gtsang ma dang bcas pas
T02D3434:91a-13: sgrub pa po byang phyogs kyi sgor gnas nas rang
T02D3434:91a-14: gi zla ba dang nyi ma la blta bar mi
T02D3434:91a-15: bya'o // sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas nas //
T02D3434:91a-16: tshangs par spyod pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D3434:91a-17: ma thos pa yi bstan bcos kyang //
T02D3434:91b-0: rig cing longs spyod nus @91b par 'gyur //
T02D3434:91b-1: thos pa rnams ni mi brjed cing //
T02D3434:91b-3: gang gis spyi bor phye ma yis //
T02D3434:91b-4: rab tu byin gyur rkang pa dang //
T02D3434:91b-5: thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02D3434:91b-6: ji srid nyi ma zla ba'i bar //
T02D3434:91b-7: mkha' 'gro ma dang gza' dang ni //
T02D3434:91b-8: dgra dang nad rnams skye mi 'gyur //
T02D3434:91b-9: byugs pas nad rnams thams cad kyang //
T02D3434:91b-10: rtag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D3434:91b-11: hr'i:yig rkan las byung ba yi //
T02D3434:91b-12: 'jig rten mgon po rnam par bsgom //
T02D3434:91b-13: phyag gnyis g-yas pa mchog sbyin dang //
T02D3434:91b-14: g-yon pa pad bsnams sku mdog dkar //
T02D3434:91b-15: ral pa'i nang gnas 'od dpag med //
T02D3434:91b-16: sna tshogs chu skyes zla ba la //
T02D3434:91b-17: mgon po rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D3434:91b-18: mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bsgom //
